truth-or-dare-troubled-teens.question: What’s something you’ve never told your parents?
What’s the most awkward date you’ve ever been on?
What’s the biggest lie you’ve ever told?
What’s the strangest rumor you’ve heard about yourself?
What’s the wildest thing you’ve done to impress someone?
Have you ever had a crush on someone in this room?
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve done to get someone’s attention?
What’s a secret you’ve kept from your closest friend?
What’s your biggest insecurity?
When was the last time you cried, and why?
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve done in front of a crush?
What’s one thing you wish you could change about yourself?
Have you ever had a near-death experience? What happened?
What’s the most awkward text you’ve ever sent to the wrong person?
Have you ever been rejected by someone you really liked? What did you do next?
What’s the most awkward situation you’ve had with a crush?
Have you ever gotten revenge on someone? What did you do?
What’s the biggest secret you’ve told that wasn’t supposed to be shared?
What’s the most uncomfortable outfit you’ve worn just to impress someone?
What’s something you’ve done that still makes you cringe today?
Have you ever had a dream about someone in this room? What happened?
Have you ever lied about your age to get something you wanted?
What’s the most shocking thing you’ve discovered about a friend or family member?
What’s something you’ve done that you instantly regretted?
What’s the most cringe-worthy thing you’ve done trying to be funny?
What’s the most trouble you’ve ever gotten into at a party?
What’s the silliest argument you’ve had with someone?
What’s the weirdest reason you’ve stopped talking to someone?
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve done in front of someone you liked?
Have you ever been caught talking behind someone’s back? What happened?
What’s the most awkward text message conversation you’ve had with a stranger?
Have you ever made up a story about yourself to sound more interesting?
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve been scared of?
What’s the most awkward time you’ve laughed when you weren’t supposed to?
What’s the pettiest thing you’ve done in a relationship?
Have you ever eavesdropped and heard something shocking? What did you hear?
Have you ever stalked someone online? Who and why?
What’s the most embarrassing moment you’ve had at a party?
Have you ever pretended to like someone when you didn’t? Who and Why?
What’s the most embarrassing photo of you online?
What’s the worst prank you’ve pulled?
What’s the grossest thing you’ve done but wouldn’t admit to in public?
What’s the biggest secret you’ve accidentally let slip?
What’s the dumbest thing you’ve done out of jealousy?
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve overheard about yourself?
What’s the most awkward encounter you’ve had with an ex?
What’s the grossest habit you have that you wouldn’t want anyone to know?
Have you ever done something out of spite and regretted it later?
What’s the silliest thing you’ve gotten emotional over?
Have you ever tried to impress someone and failed miserably? What happened?
What’s the worst thing you’ve done because of peer pressure?
What’s your most embarrassing moment at work or school? What happened?
What’s the most ridiculous fight you’ve had with a friend?
What’s something you’ve done that you wouldn’t want your parents to know?
Have you ever accidentally offended someone without realizing it?
Have you ever told a lie that spiraled out of control? What was the lie?
Have you ever insulted someone by accident while trying to compliment them?
What’s the most ridiculous thing you’ve been tricked into doing?
What’s the most uncomfortable secret someone’s shared with you?
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve had to explain to someone?
What’s your biggest red flag in a relationship?
Have you ever dined and dashed?
What’s your strangest deal breaker in dating?
Would you date someone shorter or taller than your usual preference?
How long was your longest relationship?
Who in the room would you want to help you bury a body?
What do you secretly worry people judge you for?
Who do you dislike the most in this room?
If you had to kiss one person in this room, who would it be?
What’s a lie you’ve told your best friend?
When and where was your first kiss? Who was it with? How was it?
What’s the meanest thing you’ve said to someone?
Who was your worst kiss?
Who are you most jealous of in the room?
When was the last time you apologized? What was it for?
When was the last time you made someone cry?
How many people have you kissed?
Who in this room would be your one phone call if you were in jail?
Who’s the last person you stalked on social media?
What’s the worst advice you’ve ever given to someone?
What’s the worst advice someone’s ever given you?
Would you volunteer as tribute for someone in this room in The Hunger Games?
When was the last time you wanted to punch someone?
When was the last time you were really angry? Why?
When was the last time you were rejected?
Have you ever seriously injured someone?
Who in this room do you trust the least?
Send a voice message to a random contact, singing a song chosen by the group.
Post an old, embarrassing photo of yourself on social media.
Let the group send a voice note to a random contact from your phone.
Let someone draw on your face with a pen or marker for one minute.
Send a cheesy pickup line to your crush or partner.
Let the group pick a random item from the kitchen for you to eat or drink.
Allow someone to draw a mustache on your face with a marker.
Let someone write a random word on your arm, and you can't explain it if anyone asks later.
Let someone send a text from your phone without revealing what they wrote.
Call your crush or partner and pretend to be someone else.
Text your crush or partner and ask them out in the most awkward way possible.
Let someone pick a random photo from your phone for you to explain to the group.
Write a short poem about someone in the room and read it aloud.
Swap socks with someone for the next two rounds.
confess your feelings to your crush.
Let another player post any photo of their choice to your Instagram story.
Give a kissing demonstration using a pillow.
Text someone song lyrics, sending them line by line.
Flirt with a player chosen by the group for the next three rounds.
Lick a bar of soap.
Tell a lie during the game—if no one catches it, they have to do the punishment.
Try to make yourself cry in front of the group.
Insult everyone in the room—playfully, of course.
let another player smell your armpits.
Try to fit your whole fist in your mouth.
Wear your clothes backwards for the next five rounds.
Do an impression of another player until the group guesses who it is.
Pour ice down your pants.
Text your ex with the message: 'I miss you.'
Try to do the splits.
Act out a marriage proposal, choosing someone in the room as your 'partner.'
Make a prank call to someone in your contacts.
Try to squat the person sitting to your right.
truth-or-dare-troubled-teens.punishment: Take 2 sips if you fail or 4 sips now

truth-or-dare-troubled-teens.question: Send a heart-eye emoji to your crush’s latest Instagram story.
Call a friend and tell them you have a huge crush on them.
Kiss someone in the room on the cheek.
Sit on someone’s lap for the next two rounds.
Call your crush and stay silent for 10 seconds, then hang up.
Let someone send a random emoji in your most recent text conversation.
Let someone paint your nails with anything they can find.
Text your crush or partner asking what their favorite vegetable is.
Take something from the fridge and give it a passionate kiss.
Let someone in the group describe your most attractive feature in detail.
Call your crush or partner and say something flirty while keeping it mysterious.
Let someone give you a Chinese burn.
Comment heart-eye emojis on your crush's latest post.
